device-group-content:
Device Information (Tracking Results & Status, Device Info Msg)

This screen shows Device Information sensors that can be copied and pasted to other dashboards as a combined group or as group sections.
summary-content:
Device Information - Tracking Results

This screen shows the Tracking Results group for all devices.
badge-battery-content:
Device Badge and Battery Sensors

This screen shows t,he Device’s Badge and Battery sensors in several formats that can be copied and pasted to other dashboards
battery-content:
Device Battery Sensors

This screen shows the Device’s Battery sensors in several formats that can be copied and pasted to other dashboards
